snippet: Suzanne Barr, the chief of staff to the director of Immigration and Customs Enforcement, resigned on Saturday after accusations that she had created an office culture hostile to men.
abstract: Suzanne Barr, the chief of staff to the director of Immigration and Customs Enforcement, resigns after accusations that she created a sexualized office culture that was hostile to men; Barr had been on leave because of the allegations, which she disputes.
lead_paragraph: Suzanne Barr, the chief of staff to the director of Immigration and Customs Enforcement, resigned on Saturday after accusations that she had created an office culture hostile to men.

headline.seo: ICE Official Suzanne Barr Quits Over Discrimination Claims
headline.main: Top Official at ICE Quits Over Discrimination Claims
headline.print_headline: Top Official At ICE Quits Over Claims In Lawsuit
